nodes.text: Priority Supplies Battlefield Expansion is an expansion to Star Wars: Legion, an asymmetrical two player infantry-based wargame published by Fantasy Flight Games. As indicated by the name, it includes 12 scale models of various key Battlefield supplies, including 3 comms stations, 4 moisture vaporators, and 5 supply crates. It was first announced on March 9, 2018, and released in July of that year.

The battles of Star Wars: Legion can rage across the galaxy. You may be fighting in the desert wastes of Tatooine, the snow fields of Hoth, the grassy fields of Lothal, or the tropical beaches of Scarif. No matter where the Galactic Civil War takes you, the Priority Supplies Battlefield Expansion has the miniatures to bring new life to your battlefields.

Your troops may hunker down behind sturdy barricades or desperately maneuver to secure crates, comms stations, and moisture vaporators. With a total of twelve objective miniatures between these two expansions, you'll have everything you need to bring a new level of Star Wars realism to your games of Star Wars: Legion.
